transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha good morning sir. Mai Kanchan IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu aapke account naam se. Sir aapne customer care pe call kiya tha na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ha to batayenge kya concern hai sir? Issue resolve ho gaya ya hai abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi kaha issue resolve hua madam. Lead sahi nahi aa rahi hai bilkul bhi koi bhi kaam ki nahi aa rahi hai. Literally waste of money hai.
Executive: Ha ek bhi relevant lead nahi.
Customer: Aur keywords bhi hai na isme add nahi hai jo categories hai na wo proper add nahi hai usme ek do categories hi add ho rakhi hai.
Executive: Accha. Aap isme hai na ek minute lagega.
Executive: Aapko na ye video meet pe aapko jo bulaya gaya tha video meet pe discussion ho gaya hai ki mai link bheju aap abhi join karenge?
Customer: Madam abhi to mai dekhiye kisi party ke pass ja raha hu. Meri meeting hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To mai aapko hai na call kar lunga ek baar. Thik hai na fir aap uske baad dekh lena.
Customer: Madam mai waha se free ho jau mujhe nahi pata kyuki mai 15 minute me nikal raha hu yaha se.
Executive: Accha. Ek baar 3 baje mai aapko call hi kar leti hu ya fir aap mujhe call kar lijiyega. Agar call pe possible hai to mujhe call pe hi bata do mai call pe hi kar deti hu sir agar 5 minute.
Customer: Madam aap isme dekhiye mai aapko ek cheez batata hu. Aapko bhi samajhne me aasani rahegi. Aap hai na aapke IndiaMART pe meri do farme hai matlab meri jo partiya hai na unki do farme added hai. Aap usko dekhiye uske keywords dekhiye. Wo kya keywords hai bata dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Madam company name hai Mumbai ki R G T.
Executive: Hmm. Mumbai ki party hai?
Customer: Ha RGT Corporation.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Okay RGT Corporation Malad West okay.
Customer: Bilkul. Ye hai ek firm iske keyword dekh lijiyega ek aapke pass bhi hogi abhi. Ab to wo to Jaipur shift ho gayi mai aapko do teen farme bata deta hu. Ek hai kya kehte hai apne Sindhi Fiber Glass. Credo Credo Fiber Glass Credo hogi Credo firm hai.
Executive: Ye kaha ka hai?
Customer: Ajmer.
Customer: Waise iski firm ka naam hai Sindhi Fiber Glass Private Limited.
Customer: Kya bataya company ka name?
Customer: Sindhi Fiber Glass Private Limited.
Customer: Actually Indus Fire Limited bol rahe hai.
Executive: Kaunsi category me deal karte hai?
Customer: Fiber gundo me deal karte hai ye. Agar wo nahi mil rahi hai to aap Lakshita Planters dekh lijiye.
Executive: Kaha ka?
Customer: Lakshita Planters Ajmer ki hai.
Executive: Lakshita Lakshita Industries ye bol rahe hai?
Customer: Madam Ajmer ki hai ye bhi banati hai wo. Shayad Industries hai ha Lakshita Industries hogi Ajmer ki hai.
Executive: Ha ha Ajmer ki hai Lakshita Industries. Thik hai.
Executive: Ek thi company aur wo Malad West ka ek.
Customer: Ha inko dekh lijiye. Ye company hai aur agar aapke isme Bolan Chila add ho Gujarat ki hai Bolan Chila.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap inke keywords dekhiye wo keywords add kijiye jisse mere ko leads mil rahe hai. Aap chahe to inke yaha se bhi kuch photos kuch photos jo aapko achi lag rahi ho na madam chahiye aap unme se dusre Google se utha ke add karna chahe aap add kar sakte ho.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm kyuki mere ko relevant lead nahi mil rahi.
Customer: Almost almost same keyword hai sir ye Lakshita Industries aur jo RP jo wala bataya aapne.
Customer: RGT Corporation.
Executive: Ha wo almost keywords to sab me wahi char panch keyword hai aapke catalog me teen keyword hai to do teen aur keyword add karne wala hai bas.
Customer: Aap ek baar aap inka dekh lijiye photos wagera aap Google se lena chahe isse related ya aise kuch photos add karna chahe aap usme se kar sakte hai. Fir apan 3 baje ke baad ek baar mai check karke apan add aur dekh le. Right madam?
Executive: Hmm thik hai. Aur mujhe WhatsApp pe bhi item.
Customer: Accha mujhe bataye ki mujhe kuch industry item bhi add karana hai jaise machinery isme bhi kuch fiber ke parts hi lagte hai to hum banate hai. Agar wo add karana chahe to wo uski category alag banegi.
Executive: Ha matlab listing alag listing bana dungi na uska mai aap mujhe photo product ka name.
Customer: Mai abhi ja raha hu photos wagera click karke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai ye mai abhi keywords wagera na mai abhi add kar deti hu thik hai baad me mai confirmation ke liye mai aapko call karungi thodi der me update karne ke baad. Thik hai uske baad ticket close karne ka allow kar dijiyega jo aapne call kiya tha.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapko update karke mai aapko thodi der me connect karti hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Keywords and categories are not properly added.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check and add keywords.

- Executive will call the customer after updating.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after updating.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, categories, catalog
